text: @GovernorTomWolf Governor Wolf let me fix that for ya: "Remember that as long as #COVID19 is a threat, no social activity outside your home where you will run into others is completely without risk of INFECTING OTHERS BECAUSE YOU MAY NOT KNOW YOU HAVE IT SO DON'T KILL GRANDMAS AND #WEARYOURMASK."
